text: Firoun ne kaha “tum Moosa ki baat maan gaye qabl iske ke main tumhein ijazat deta! Zaroor yeh tumhara bada hai jisne tumhein jaadu sikhaya hai. Accha, abhi tumhein maloom hua jaata hai, main tumhare haath paon mukhalif simton (opposite sides) mein katwaunga aur tum sabko sooli (crucify) chadha dunga”
